officialTitle: A Long-term, Multicenter, Open-Label, Flexible Dose Continuation Study in Subjects Who Have Completed a Prior Lurasidone Study
summary: This is an open-label continuation study designed to monitor the safety, tolerability and effectiveness of lurasidone in subjects who have completed participation in a lurasidone extension study (NCT00868959 and NCT01566162) and who may benefit from continued treatment with lurasidone.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Treatment Emergent AEs, SAEs or Who Discontinued Due to AEs
